Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Javelin - Reinforce, Extra Strike and Boss Rush
  • Longinus Spear - Cooldown Cutter
  • Deus - Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Crystal Battery
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, after completing your storyline, Illium gains access to an orb that you control and interact with. The orb has a special resource called 'Charges' that Radiant Javelin, Radiant Orb, and Longinus Spear generate each time it hits the orb

Below are the skills that generate Charges:

  • Radiant Javelin (1st Job) - 1 Charge
  • Radiant Javelin (1st Job) - 2 Charges
  • Longinus Spear (4th Job) - 3 Charges

Additionally, there are special skills that can be used once you reach a certain amount of Charges called 'Crystal Skills'. Crystal Skills do not consume Charges, instead they reset every time you hit the max amount of Charges. Crystal Skills can only be used one time until your Charges are reset

Below are all your Crystal Skills:

  • Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light (2nd Job) - 30 Charges
  • Crystal Skill - Resonance (3rd Job) - 60 Charges
  • Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory (3rd Job) - 150 Charges
  • Crystal Skill - Deus (4th Job) - 90 Charges

Additionally, whenever Radiant Javelin, Radiant Orb, and Longinus Spear hits the orb, it triggers a special attack. Reaction - Destruction triggers when or hits the orb and Reaction - Domination triggers when hits the orb

primary.name: Shelter Return
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100\nCooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: Teleports to Illium's hideout

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 50% of your equipment's Attack Power is converted to Magic ATT, excluding your weapon. Any set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 20% of your weapon's base attack power.

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'Exclusive Spell'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Radiant Javelin
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4\nDamage against normal monsters: +20%
primary.desc: Launches a javelin that bounces between enemies
details: Attack can hit the same enemy multiple times
Javelins can also bounce off of your orb
Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Radiant Orb
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15. Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 50%, Number of Attacks: 1. Radiant Javelin Damage: +15% for 2 sec after use.
primary.desc: Casts an orb forward that passes through and damages enemies
details: briefly deals increased %Damage after using Radiant Orb
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as

primary.name: Ex
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 90, Duration: 180 sec. Moves to the target and attacks for a short time. Damage increases after a certain number of hits.
[Stage 1] Damage: 60%, increases after 10 hits.
[Stage 2] Damage: 100%, increases after 10 hits.
[Stage 3] Damage: 200%, attack ends after 20 hits.
primary.desc: Summons a robot that attaches itself to a target and deals continuous build-up damage
details: Ignores Damage Reflect

primary.name: Crystalline Wings
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport horizontally a distance of 195, or vertically a distance of 275.
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used while on ladders
While in the air, if you hold down the Skill Key, you can fly around

primary.name: Lucent Gauntlet Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Lucent Gauntlet Mastery: +40%, Critical Rate: +20%, Damage Taken: -40%

primary.name: Lucent Brand
primary.shortDesc: Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 10 sec\nAttack Power & Magic ATT +2 per stack\n[Passive Effects - Max HP & Max MP: +10%, Damage: +10%, DEF: +100]
primary.desc: When hits an enemy, you gain a stacking Attack and Magic Attack buff
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Max HP/MP, %Damage and grants flat DEF

primary.name: Crystal Battery
primary.shortDesc: Max Crystal Charges: 30\n- Radiant Javelin Grants 1 Charge\n- Radiant Orb Grants 2 Charges
primary.desc: A special resource for using Crystal Skills that generates when certain attacks hit your orb
details: When interacts with your orb, you gain 1 Charge
When interacts with your orb, you gain 2 Charges

In 2nd job, the orb can only hold 30 Charges
  • Once your orb reaches max Charges, it will reset back to 0
  • Using a Crystal Skill will not consume your Charges instead, you can only use a Crystal Skill once per Charge reset

primary.name: Deploy Crystal
primary.shortDesc: Your Crystal Battery will reset 10 sec after reaching the max Crystal Charge count.
primary.desc: When first used, summons an orb (that will not expire)
details: You can press the Skill Key again to move it in front of you
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will teleport the orb to your location

primary.name: Reaction - Destruction
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 9 , Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 4\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: When hits the orb, a destructive blast is released from the orb
details: Using will also trigger this attack

primary.name: Reaction - Domination
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 9 , Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 1\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: When hits the orb, a radiant blast is released from the orb
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Vortex of Light
primary.shortDesc: Crystal Charge Cost: 30, MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 10
primary.desc: Beams of light quickly spin around your orb damaging nearby enemies
details: Requires a minimum of 30 Charges to use

primary.name: Gauntlet Frenzy
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Duration: 300 sec, Lucent Gauntlet Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Machina
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 180 sec\nDamage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 4, Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Summons a robot that hovers over your orb and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Aegis of Light
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -70%, MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed from Boss: 3% of Max MP
primary.desc: Reduces damage taken (excludes %Max HP attacks) and your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max MP
details: MP absorption effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Umbral Brand
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 10 sec, DEF: 4%\nIllium's attacks inflict 20% bonus damage against Umbral Branded targets.
primary.desc: Enemies hit by will gain a stacking debuff
details:
[Debuff]: Enemy has reduced %DEF and takes increased %Damage from Illium (except from )
  • Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Crystal Battery II
primary.shortDesc: Max Crystal Charges: 150\n-Radiant Javelin Grants 1 Charge\n-Radiant Orb Grants 2 Charges
details: Increases max Crystal Charge from 30 to 150

primary.name: Reaction - Destruction II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 130, Max Enemies Hit: 9, Damage: 610%, Number of Attacks: 4, Detonations: 2\nCooldown: 4 sec
details: Increases %Damage of attack
Now activates twice in a row and has increased %Boss Damage

primary.name: Reaction - Domination II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 12 , Damage: 610%, Number of Attacks: 2, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 4 sec
details: Increases %Damage and number of hits
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory
primary.shortDesc:
Crystal Charge Cost: 150
Duration: 20 sec
Final Damage: +25%, Knockback Resistance: +100%, Boss Damage: +30%
Winged Javelin: Explodes on contact, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 6, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +20%
primary.desc: Allows you to fly and throw explosive Winged Javelins
details: Requires a minimum of 150 Charges to use
While in Wings of Glory, gain increased %Final Damage, %Boss Damage, and 100% Knockback Resistance
While active, you can still use to teleport
Winged Javelins deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Resonance
primary.shortDesc: Crystal Charge Cost: 60, MP Cost: 200, Resonance Cycles: 15, Effect: Grants Lucent Brand, Restores 10% of Max HP\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%]
primary.desc: Creates a tether between you and the orb and inflicts to enemies it touches
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Requires a minimum of 60 Charges to use
This skill also heals some %Max HP and grants whenever it comes in contact with Illium or a party member

primary.name: Crystalline Wings - Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Crystalline Wings Teleport Distance: Horizontal +60, Vertical +45.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of

primary.name: Lucent Brand II
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 6, Duration: 10 sec
[Stack Bonuses] 1-3 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +2
4 - 6 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +4
[Passive Effects - Radiant Javelin Damage +200%p]
details: Increases max stacks from 3 to 6
Additionally, permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Umbral Brand II
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 3 times, Duration: 10 sec
Reduces enemy Defense based on stack count.
[Stack Bonuses]1 Stack: DEF -4%
2-3 Stacks: DEF -4%
Illium's attacks aginst Umbral Branded enemies inflict an additional hit dealing 30%. The bonus hit's damage is multiplied up to 3x based on the number of Stacks.
details: Increases max stacks from 1 to 3
Now when attacking, deal an additional attack that increases in damage based on the number of stacks

primary.name: Might of the Flora
primary.shortDesc:
Max HP & MP: +20%
Damage: +10%
Jump: +10, Movement Speed: +10, Max Movement Speed: +10
Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Tenacity
primary.shortDesc: Intelligence: +40, Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Endless Research
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +50, Critical Damage: +30%, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Crystal Battery III
primary.shortDesc:
Max Crystal Charges: 150
-Radiant Javelin Grants 1 Charge
-Radiant Orb Grants 2 Charges
-Longinus Spear Grants 3 Charges
details: When hits the orb, grants 3 Charges

primary.name: Radiant Javelin II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 95%p, Number of Attacks: 1\nOn Hit: Creates 2 shards that each inflict 130% damage. Upon using Winged Javelin: Creates 3 additional projectiles instead of shards which pursue enemies and strike for 250% damage 3 times.\n[Passive Effects - Increases Winged Javelin's damage by 200%]
details:
When hits an enemy, create shards that seek and attack nearby enemies
  • While in , your also fires extra projectiles that seek out enemies
Additionally increases %Damage of during

primary.name: Radiant Orb II
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 2, Damage: +260p%
details: Increases %p Damage of attack
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with

primary.name: Longinus Spear
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150
Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 950%, Number of Attacks: 8
Boss Damage: +20%
Cooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Throws a giant spear in the direction of your orb
details: Deals increased %Boss Damage
Will also trigger

primary.name: Crystal Skill - Deus
primary.shortDesc: Crystal Charge Cost: 90, MP Cost: 300, Duration: 30 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 5\nSatellite Attack Power is equial to Ex's.\n[Passive Effects - Ex Damage: +100%]
primary.desc: Combines and to summon a giant robot that fights alongside you
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of
Requires a minimum of 90 Charges to summon

primary.name: Vortex Wings
primary.shortDesc: Crystal Charge Cost: 30, MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1070%, Number of Attacks: 15\n[Passive Effects: Increases damage for Reaction - Destruction II and Reaction - Domination II by 135%p]
primary.desc: Creates a shockwave that deals heavy damage to nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of and
Can only be used during and only one time

primary.name: Resonance Wings
primary.shortDesc: Places Umbral Brands on enemies and Lucent Brands on allies, up to 12 targets.\n[Passive Effects - Crystal Skill - Increases Vortex of Light's damage by +100%]
primary.desc: While in , create projectiles that applies to nearby enemies and to nearby party members
details: Additionally, permanently increases %Damage of

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Flash Crystal Battery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, immediately fully charges Crystal.\nCooldown: 180 sec

primary.name: Lucent Brand III
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 10, Duration: 10 sec
[Stack Bonuses]
1-3 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +2
4-6 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +4
7-9 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +6
10 Stacks: Attack Power & Magic ATT +10
[Passive Effects - Machina Damage: +100%p]

Additionally, permanently increases %p Damage of

primary.name: Umbral Brand III
primary.shortDesc:
Max Stacks: 5, Duration: 10 sec
[Stack Bonuses]
1 Stack: DEF: -4%
2-3 Stack: DEF: -4%
4-5 Stack: DEF: -4%
Illium's attacks against Umbral Branded enemies inflict an additional hit dealing 40%. The bonus hit's damage is multiplied up to 5x based on the number of Stacks.
details: Increases max stacks from 3 to 5
Increases %Damage of additional attack

primary.name: Wisdom of the Crystal
primary.shortDesc: Lucent Gauntlet Mastery: +70%\nAttack Speed: +1, Knockback Resistance: +60%\nBoss Damage: +30%, Ignore DEF: +25%, Final Damage: +45%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage), %Boss Damage, %Ignore DEF, and %Final Damage

hyperPassive.name: Deus - Extra Strike
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Crystal Skill - Deus & Satellite Attack Counts: +1

hyperPassive.name: Deus - Boss Rush
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Crystal Skill - Deus & Satellite Boss Damage: +20%

hyperActive.name: Crystalline Bulwark
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Invincibility: 0.6 sec per Lucent Brand stack\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, you and your party members become invulnerable based on how many Lucent Brand stacks the player currently has

hyperActive.name: Longinus Zone
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 3, Explosions: 4\nInvulnerable while casting\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Launches several spears in a single area
details: You are invincible while casting

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Flora class in the party.

fifthMain.name: Crystal Ignition
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost per Attack: 30, Max Key-Down Duration: 6 sec, DoT: 2331%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 15. Damage increased by 20% when attacking a boss.\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, fire a beam of light forward
details: Deals increased %Boss Damage
Refreshes stacks of on enemies

fifthMain.name: Reaction - Spectral Blast
fifthMain.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1900%, Boss Damage: +20%, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 1 sec
fifthMain.desc: When hits your orb, it splits and creates three beams of light in front of you
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) as and you get both skills at together

fifthMain.name: Templar Knight
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 40 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, DoT: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12\nIf Crystal Charges reach 3 while preparing attack, Final Damage is multiplied by 2.\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a giant robot that charges up and releases a projectile forward
details:
Templar Knight will prepare the attack in the direction of the boss with the highest HP first within range
  • If both directions have the same priority, the attack will be prepared in the direction of Illium
With sufficient Charges, Templar Knight deals increased Final Damage
Ignores by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Crystalline Spirit
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, uses 1 crystal shard
A crystalline spirit forms near the mytocrystal for 30 sec. Only 75% of Final Damage for the Reaction skill the spirit activates is applied, but if it's the 5th skill, 100% is applied. Not affected by cooldown reset.
Using Wings of Glory will disperse the crystalline spirit. Each spirit dispersed in the remaining time increases damage by 30%.
Prepares 1 crystal shard every 20 sec up to 2 shards.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec
[Passive Effect: Magic ATT: +55]
fifthMain.desc: Summons an additional orb
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants flat Magic Attack
Costs 1 crystal shard to summon, which are gained every 20 secs (up to 2 at a time)
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will consume all crystal shards and summon all the orbs at once

This crystal acts exactly the same as and can activate Reaction skills
  • Deals reduced %Final Damage unless the it's a 5th Job Skill
Using will consume all active but increases your %Damage based on how many consumed
Unaffected by cooldown resets

fifthMain.name: Crystal Gate
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 155 sec, Max Crystal Gates: 3, activates after setting up at least 2. The setup time and the Crystal Gate duration are the same. After using it once, all Crystal Gates cannot be used for 2 sec and Crystal Gates you actually used cannot be used for 5 sec.\nPeriodically obtain Magic ATT +55 buff for 25 sec around the Crystal Gate. Direct skill attacks that hit during the buff will bombard 5 times through the Crystal Gate up to 3 enemies with 900% damage. Cooldown: 1.5 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec. Cooldown is reduced as much as 50% of the remaining cooldown if it ends before the Crystal Gate's duration.
fifthMain.desc: Places down a portal that allows you to travel back and forth from both
details:
To use the portal, press the Up Arrow Key on the portal
  • Has a cooldown (2 secs) between teleports and the portal used also has a cooldown (5 secs)
While near the portal, gain a Magic Attack buff and your attacks create explosions that damage nearby enemies
Using a portal can activate
If the skill ends early, a portion of the cooldown is refunded based on the remaining duration

masteryCore.name: HEXA Radiant Javelin
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 3
When a javelin hits: Creates 2 shards that each inflict 200% damage
When hitting a mytocrystal or an enemy with a javelin, 1 mytocrystal shard are obtained, and up to one mytocrystal shard can be obtained per javelin
After obtaining 30 mytocrystal shards, the next javelin becomes an Enchanted Javelin
Enchanted Javelin: throws 3 javelins at once, charge 25 mytocrystal
If the Javelin Shard created by the Enchanted Javelin hit a single enemy, the final damage from the second Javelin Shard is reduced by 50%

masteryCore.name: HEXA Winged Javelin
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 925%, Number of Attacks: 6
When a javelin hits: Creates 3 magic missiles that attack 3 times with 375% damage
When a javelin hits, one glory mytocrystal shard is obtained, and up to one glory mytocrystal shard can be obtained per javelin
After obtaining 10 mytocrystal shards, the next javelin becomes an Enchanted Javelin
Enchanted Javelin: throws 3 javelins at once
If the magic missile created by the Enchanted Javelin hits a single enemy, the final damage from the second magic missile is reduced by 50%

originSkill.name: Mytocrystal Expanse
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
When used while Wings of Glory is active, increases Wings of Glory duration by 10 sec
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 5400%, Number of Attacks: 4, Number of Magic Explosions: 7.
Damage: 6000%, Number of attacks: 6, Number of Magic Explosions: 5.
Damage: 6600%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Magic Explosions: 4
Summons infinite mytocrystals for 20 sec
When there is a reaction from the mytocrystal, it resonates to deal 2400% damage up to 15 enemies 12 times. Resonate Cooldown: 1 sec
After 3 resonates, Mytocrystal Crystals Created: 25, Damage: 2400%,
Mytocrystal Crystal Cooldown: 2 sec
Cooldown: 360 sec

notable.name: Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory - 3rd Job

meta: Illium is primary stat is INT and uses a new weapon called Magic Gauntlet and secondary weapons Lucent Wings. Illium revolves around the controlling a magical orb. You can move the orb around and attack with that orb which requires charging the orb and interacting with it
